            double yVal,
            double radius,

            double velocityY)
        Creates a new ball with the values
        Parameters:
        xVal - The initial x value
        yVal - The initial y value
        radius - The radius of the ball
        mass - The mass of the ball
        velocityX - The initial x velocity of the ball
        velocityY - The initial y velocity of the ball
